dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5192 IH: To modify the annual report on the Navy Shipyard Infrastructure Optimization Program.

action.action-desc: Mr. Khanna introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To modify the annual report on the Navy Shipyard Infrastructure Optimization Program.

section.header: Modification to annual report on Navy Shipyard Infrastructure Optimization Program
section.text: Section 355(c)(2)(A) of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2022 (Public Law 117â€“81; 10 U.S.C. 8013 note) is amended by inserting and the incorporation of digital infrastructure (including hardware, software, and cloud storage) and platforms before ; and.
